BTW, there is a [whole forum for Type-ID-Requests](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022055115/http:/typophile.com/forum/29).

ah ha, thanks, I will post future posts there then, and cheers for the ID

M
The Bon Marche department store chain (before the owners switched them to Macy's) used a bunch of customized Trebuchet derivatives - this doesn't look like one of them, but you never know.

Look at the contrast in the 'O' and 'G' - it's a little too much for a standard geometric face. This could be a stretched out condensed font, maybe Futura Condensed.

- Lex
